########
Examples
########

Examples for :mod:`imgblender`.

blender.py
~~~~~~~~~~
A python script for blending image data.

for more information, view the help::

    python3 examples/blender.py -h


build_doc_images.py
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Build the images for the :mod:`imgblender` documentation.

For more information, view the help::

    python3 examples/build_doc_images.py -h
